text: Danny Jones (6 March 1986 â€“ 3 May 2015) was a Welsh professional rugby league footballer. He played at international level for Wales and at club level for Halifax and Keighley Cougars. Jones died of cardiac arrest while playing in London. He was 29 years old. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British rugby league players Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Welsh sportspeople
title: Danny Jones (rugby league)
